llz_sike.NAME: Etch
llz_sike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! llzmod:mark. NL Exhaust.

llz_popsl.NAME: Fragmentation Grenade
llz_popsl.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to a random enemy !M! times. NL Take !LlzMagic! damage.

llz_dianHQG.NAME: Arc Cut
llz_dianHQG.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust. NL Retain.

llz_hej.NAME: Alloy
llz_hej.DESCRIPTION: All llzmod:Machines gain !M! charge. NL Exhaust.

llz_leis.NAME: Laser
llz_leis.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Exhaust.

llz_jiangz.NAME: Noise Reduction
llz_jiangz.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all status cards, gain !M! Block for each. NL Exhaust.

llz_cuih.NAME: Quench
llz_cuih.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL llzmod:modify a card, if it is an attack card, modify it !M! times.

llz_beny.NAME: Origin
llz_beny.DESCRIPTION: llzmod:modify all cards in the draw pile. NL Exhaust.
llz_beny.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL llzmod:modify all cards in the draw pile. NL Exhaust.

llz_lians.NAME: Crush
llz_lians.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. If the enemy intends to attack, apply !M! Weak.

llz_qianc.NAME: Lurk
llz_qianc.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a Slime to your hand.

llz_moryy.NAME: Doomsday Preview
llz_moryy.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played after turn !M!. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies. Gain [E] [E] [E].

llz_gangthl.NAME: Steel Torrent
llz_gangthl.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Deal !D! damage to a random enemy 2 times. NL Deal !D! damage to all enemies 3 times.

llz_yinqhm.NAME: Engine Roar
llz_yinqhm.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Any excess cards drawn will randomly llzmod:modify cards in your hand. NL When this card is llzmod:modified , draw 2 additional cards.

llz_diedq.NAME: Iterator
llz_diedq.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL llzmod:modify all status cards in your hand.
llz_diedq.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL llzmod:modify all cards in your hand.

llz_feixv.NAME: Ruins
llz_feixv.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL When this card is llzmod:modified , add a Laser to your draw pile.

llz_guns.NAME: Rolling Stone
llz_guns.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Sequentially attack the next enemy, increasing damage by !M! each time.

llz_duocdd.NAME: Multi-Forge
llz_duocdd.DESCRIPTION: llzmod:modify a card in your hand !M! times. NL Exhaust.

llz_miaossj.NAME: Rapid Fire
llz_miaossj.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL If other cards are played from your hand, deal one less hit.

llz_cisb.NAME: Infrasound
llz_cisb.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to all enemies. NL Destroy minions.

llz_hundbc.NAME: Chaotic Pendulum
llz_hundbc.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage 2 times. NL Increase damage by one each turn.

llz_jinmyq.NAME: Precision Instruments
llz_jinmyq.DESCRIPTION: The first attack card you play each turn deals double damage.

llz_wujcf.NAME: Fearless Charge
llz_wujcf.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !B! Block in boss and elite fights.

llz_cuanqdj.NAME: Legendary Strike
llz_cuanqdj.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Becomes stronger after battling llzmod:elite.

llz_zuzbx.NAME: Cursed Chest
llz_zuzbx.DESCRIPTION: Cannot be played. NL Upon entering your deck, gain !M! gold and obtain a relic.
llz_zuzbx.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Cannot be played. NL Upon entering your deck, gain !M! gold and obtain a relic. NL Ethereal.

llz_touzcl.NAME: Throwing Gear
llz_touzcl.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Discard a card, draw a card of the same type.

llz_zuangjzq.NAME: Armored Heavy Punch
llz_zuangjzq.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Consume all llzmod:overheat , adding !M! damage per stack. NL Gain llzmod:overheat .

llz_cenzbb.NAME: Heavy Backpack
llz_cenzbb.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust. NL Upon entering your deck, obtain a llzmod:pebble relic.

llz_lingbz.NAME: Inspiration Capture
llz_lingbz.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card from three llzmod:modify status cards to add to your hand. NL Exhaust.

llz_wurpf.NAME: Pollution Emission
llz_wurpf.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! cards. NL Add a random status card to your draw pile, discard pile, and hand.

llz_wanq.NAME: Tenacity
llz_wanq.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Reduce the damage you take to 0 this turn.

llz_diancqj.NAME: Electromagnetic Shot
llz_diancqj.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The next time the enemy is attacked, draw !M! cards.

llz_jieb.NAME: Vigilance
llz_jieb.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL The next status card you play this turn will not be exhausted.

llz_heiq.NAME: Black Gun
llz_heiq.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Lose 1 [E] when you draw this card.

llz_sih.NAME: Scavenge
llz_sih.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL If you have a status card in your hand, llzmod:modify it and gain !B! Block.

llz_zansyd.NAME: Tactical Induction
llz_zansyd.DESCRIPTION: Take !M! damage. NL Gain !B! Block next turn.

llz_lus.NAME: Dew
llz_lus.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played on the first turn. NL Gain [E] [E] , draw !M! cards. NL Ethereal Exhaust.

llz_zat.NAME: Misfire
llz_zat.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain !M! Burn cards.

llz_hejj.NAME: Combo Technique
llz_hejj.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Play all 0-cost attack cards from your draw pile.

llz_congjz.NAME: Impact Drill
llz_congjz.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL llzmod:modify all cards in your hand. NL If the damage is blocked, play this card again.

llz_rongl.NAME: Melt
llz_rongl.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust an attack card, gain Block equal to its damage.

llz_qvxjs.NAME: Curved Acceleration
llz_qvxjs.DESCRIPTION: Draw cards equal to the current turn number and llzmod:modify them.
llz_qvxjs.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw cards equal to the current turn number + 1 and llzmod:modify them.

llz_jiaoz.NAME: Calibration
llz_jiaoz.DESCRIPTION: Discard all starter cards. NL llzmod:modify all cards in your hand.
llz_jiaoz.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard all starter cards. NL llzmod:modify all cards in your hand twice.

llz_paog.NAME: Fake
llz_paog.DESCRIPTION: Copy all status cards in your hand, gain 1 [E] for each. NL Exhaust.
llz_paog.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Copy all status cards in your hand, gain 1 [E] for each.

llz_caofh.NAME: Overload
llz_caofh.DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL Take 3 damage for each Overload played this combat.
llz_caofh.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain [E] [E]. NL For each Overload played this combat, take 3 damage once.

llz_caofzw.NAME: Extraordinary Thing
llz_caofzw.DESCRIPTION: llzmod:modify all cards in your hand X times. NL Exhaust.
llz_caofzw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: llzmod:modify all cards in your hand X+1 times. NL Exhaust.

llz_xuanzxyw.NAME: Selective Forgetfulness
llz_xuanzxyw.DESCRIPTION: Discard any number of cards. NL The next time you play the discarded cards, they cost 1 less [E].

llz_xium.NAME: Dormancy
llz_xium.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Discard all cards into the discard pile, draw !M! additional cards next turn.

llz_jinsfx.NAME: Metal Line
llz_jinsfx.DESCRIPTION: Can only be played after the 4th turn. NL Gain !M! Block at the end of your turn.
llz_jinsfx.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Can only be played after the 4th turn. NL Gain !M! Block at the end of your turn.

llz_husz.NAME: Protective Charm
llz_husz.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn. Draw 1 card for each status card you have.

llz_ziwjg.NAME: Self-Deconstruction
llz_ziwjg.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, llzmod:modify all cards in your hand.
llz_ziwjg.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, llzmod:modify all cards in your hand.

llz_jinj.NAME: Taboo
llz_jinj.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL llzmod:modify all status cards in your hand. NL Retain Exhaust.

llz_suiyqs.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a Taboo to your hand.
llz_suiyqs.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the start of your turn, add a Taboo to your hand.

llz_heid.NAME: Black Hole
llz_heid.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Convert all status cards into Void.

llz_jinhsf.NAME: Evolution Algorithm
llz_jinhsf.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Upon Slay, transform a card in your draw pile. Exhaust.

llz_cubhl.NAME: Reserve Firepower
llz_cubhl.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL This card in your deck reverts to its unupgraded form. At the end of the turn, deal !M! damage. Void Exhaust.

llz_quanpdzsgr.NAME: Full-Spectrum Barrage Jamming
llz_quanpdzsgr.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Weak, Vulnerable, llzmod:polarity, and llzmod:mark to all enemies. All enemies lose !M! Strength. Exhaust.

llz_wangs.NAME: Past Events
llz_wangs.DESCRIPTION: Play the last card played in this combat. NL Exhaust.
llz_wangs.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Choose one of the last 3 cards played in this combat and play it. NL Exhaust.

llz_senpr.NAME: Judgment Day
llz_senpr.DESCRIPTION: Trigger all your end-of-turn and start-of-turn effects, and increase the current turn count by one. NL Exhaust.
llz_senpr.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Trigger all your end-of-turn and start-of-turn effects, and increase the current turn count by one.

llz_fangsj.NAME: Bionic Cocoon
llz_fangsj.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Layers of Plated Armor. NL For each unplayable card in your hand, gain an additional layer.

llz_wangxt.NAME: Ancient Form
llz_wangxt.DESCRIPTION: Void. NL At the end of your turn, all cards in your hand will have their next use cost reduced to 0.
llz_wangxt.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, all cards in your hand will have their next use cost reduced to 0.

llz_huawwy.NAME: Turn to Nothingness
llz_huawwy.DESCRIPTION: Void. NL At the start of your turn, draw !M! cards and turn a non-attack card into Stunned.
llz_huawwy.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, draw !M! cards and turn a non-attack card into Stunned.

llz_zutwz.NAME: Forge to Reverence
llz_zutwz.DESCRIPTION: When playing a status card, draw !M! cards.

llz_zengqj.NAME: Steam Engine
llz_zengqj.DESCRIPTION: Consume a sentinel. NL Generate llzmod:mechanical · llzmod:steamengine. NL Exhaust.

llz_xianq.NAME: Pioneer
llz_xianq.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Generate llzmod:mechanical · llzmod:sentinel and gain a Wound.
llz_xianq.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Generate llzmod:mechanical · llzmod:sentinel and gain an Alloy.

llz_sengnyq.NAME: Sonar Swarm
llz_sengnyq.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL Consume a sentinel, generate llzmod:mechanical · llzmod:swarm.

llz_yanh.NAME: Cover
llz_yanh.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Additionally, gain Block equal to the current number of mechanicals. NL Generate llzmod:mechanical · llzmod:sentinel.

llz_dianld.NAME: Electric Knife
llz_dianld.DESCRIPTION: Generate llzmod:mechanical · llzmod:electricknife. NL Clear all sentinels.
llz_dianld.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Generate llzmod:mechanical · llzmod:electricknife. NL Clear all sentinels and gain an equal amount of Charge.

llz_zanzwz.NAME: War Armament
llz_zanzwz.DESCRIPTION: Consume !M! sentinels. NL Generate llzmod:mechanical · llzmod:prototypearmament.

llz_laojjk.NAME: Neural Interface
llz_laojjk.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Generate a llzmod:mechanical · llzmod:phantom with the same intent as the enemy. NL Consume.

llz_weig.NAME: Siege
llz_weig.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL All llzmod:sentinel immediately attack once.

llz_zilzh.NAME: Mass-Energy Conversion
llz_zilzh.DESCRIPTION: If there are at least !M! mechanicals, gain [E]. NL Generate llzmod:mechanical · llzmod:sentinel.

llz_zengy.NAME: Reinforcement
llz_zengy.DESCRIPTION: Generate !M! llzmod:mechanical · llzmod:sentinel. NL Gain 1 llzmod:focus. NL Consume.

llz_canqcs.NAME: Remnant Reshape
llz_canqcs.DESCRIPTION: Receive !M! damage. NL Generate 3 llzmod:mechanical · llzmod:sentinel. Gain 3 Wounds.

llz_cuansgd.NAME: Transmission Pipeline
llz_cuansgd.DESCRIPTION: At the end of the turn, all llzmod:mechanical gain !M! Charge.

llz_quanmjg.NAME: Full Assault
llz_quanmjg.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength. NL Gain !M! llzmod:focus. NL Gain 2 Vulnerable.

llz_cuangsj.NAME: Genesis
llz_cuangsj.DESCRIPTION: At the start of the turn, gain !M! layers of Random Effects.
